title: (x) Script font on this stamp? - FF Prater Script {self (Generic Claqueur)}
content:
Hello,

I'd like to know what font is used for the "Mensch Ã¤rgere Dich nicht" on this stamp. The stamp was designed by [Henning Wagenbreth](http://web.archive.org/web/20100330221905/http:/www.wagenbreth.de/) (FF Prater).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100330221905im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stamp_4522.jpg)

Thanks!
author: generic claqueur

comments.content: Alright - solved it myself. The font is somewhat modified FF Prater Script.

This is Prater Script.See [Part 7, page 6](http://web.archive.org/web/20100330221905/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg6.html) of Script Guide.

- Mike Yanega

Ah, I see you got it. Good.

- Mike Yanega
